job.title: Product Developer - Apparel
job.description: pAt KUIU we are committed to crafting the lightest most advanced mountain hunting clothing and equipment on earth We live it We breath it And as part of the KUIU product team you obsess over itppbrppThe Product Developer is responsible for developing and commercializing product within KUIUs product portfolio With direction from the Chief Merchandising Officer and Product Managers they will create tech packs bills of materials etc and oversee the product commercialization process from brief kickoff to bulk productionppbrppESSENTIAL JOB RESPONSIBILITIESppbrpp Create and maintain tech packs throughout development processpp Perform daily communications with vendors and supplierspp Assist in the sourcing and development of new trims treatments embellishments and construction techniquespp Monitor quality control standards for trims construction techniques and finished productspp Fully evaluate development samples including measuring evaluating overall quality construction materials and tech pack adherencepp Lead fittings in partnership with Tech Designpp Evaluate component and garment costing in partnership with Sourcing and Product Managementpp Assists throughout wear test process for assigned stylespp Keep development on track hitting all milestones and deadlinesppbrppREQUIREMENTSpp Bachelors degree or equivalent work experience is preferredpp 2 years of consumer product development preferredpp Competent with Microsoft Office and Adobe Creative Suitespp Experience with PLM systems preferredpp Awareness of consumer trends competition and business processespp Needs to work well independently possess keen attention to detail have excellent follow through skills and be proactivepp Should be quick collaborative and creativepp Need to be able to thrive in a deadline driven environmentpp Have ability to multitask and handle multiple projects at oncepp Must have strong communication skills verbal and written and work well within a team environmentp
